creator: asf-bugzilla.20.world-wide@xoxy.net
text:
Created attachment 25780
SVG to reproduce font rendering problem

The name of Khammam in Telugu script is rendered wrong. Have a look in Wikipedia for a reference to the right rendering or paste text enclosed in example in an editor capable of unicode.

Enclosed example uses regular font statement as well as embedded Telugu SVG font.
Font is rendered different, but both times wrong.

reproduce problem with:
java -jar batik-rasterizer.jar telugu.svg
